polymorphism.title: Learn Polymorphism with Robots
polymorphism.description: Create a robot factory system using polymorphism. You need to:

steps.step1: Create an abstract {code}Robot{/code} class with an abstract {code}performTask(){/code} method
steps.step3: Each robot should implement {code}performTask(){/code} with its specific behavior
steps.step4: Create a {code}RobotFactory{/code} class that can create any type of robot

about.title: About Us - RoboRescue
about.subtitle: Welcome to the Future of Programming Education
about.description: RoboRescue is an innovative serious game specifically developed for distance learning students to teach the complex concepts of object-oriented programming (OOP) in an exciting and interactive way. Our game transforms the often perceived dry subject of programming into a captivating rescue adventure in a futuristic robot factory.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that learning should be fun ‚Äì especially when it comes to complex technical concepts. Our mission is to provide distance learning students with an immersive learning environment that:
points: Makes abstract concepts tangible through visual representations and practical applications
Increases motivation through an exciting rescue mission and problem-based learning
Promotes sustainable understanding through step-by-step knowledge building
Enables flexible learning for the special needs of distance learning students

rescueMission.title: The Rescue Mission
rescueMission.description: Welcome to RoboTech Industries ‚Äì a state-of-the-art robot factory that has gone out of control due to a critical system failure. As an experienced programmer, you are the hero called upon to save the factory and end the chaos. Your mission: RoboRescue!

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.description: The factory is divided into four critical departments, each representing a fundamental OOP principle. Each department needs your programming expertise to be rescued:

departments.name: Design Department - Abstraction
departments.description: Save the design software and create clear, reusable robot models

departments.name: Assembly Hall - Inheritance
departments.description: Restore the confused inheritance hierarchies and save the production

departments.name: Test Laboratory - Polymorphism
departments.description: Ensure that different robot types can be tested uniformly and save quality control

departments.name: Control Center - Concurrency
departments.description: Coordinate complex systems, solve synchronization problems, and save the entire factory

objectives.title: Your Rescue Objectives
objectives.description: After successfully completing RoboRescue, you can:

skills.title: Understand and Apply Abstraction
points: Develop interfaces for different robot types and save the design department
Create abstraction levels for complex systems

skills.title: Master Inheritance
points: Correctly implement inheritance hierarchies and save the assembly hall

skills.title: Master Polymorphism
points: Use subtype polymorphism for uniform interfaces and save the test laboratory
Apply parametric polymorphism for flexible solutions

skills.title: Understand Concurrency
points: Implement thread safety and save the control center
Save the entire factory through modern concurrency concepts

contact.title: Contact and Support
contact.description: Do you have questions about RoboRescue or need support with your rescue mission? We're here for you!

hero.title: Become a RoboRescue Hero!
hero.description: In RoboRescue, you're not just a learner ‚Äì you're the hero who saves an entire robot factory! Every solved programming task brings you closer to your goal: the complete rescue of RoboTech Industries and mastery in object-oriented programming.

journey.title: Your Hero's Journey Begins Now:
steps: Receive the emergency call from the robot factory
